Welcome to Selenium Proxy's documentation!
==========================================

Selenium Proxy is a proxy that maps between the Selenium JSONWireProtocol and the Marionette JSONWireProtocol.

Installing::

    pip install selenium_proxy

or::

    easy_install selenium_proxy


Contents:

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
